    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Main.Main
    In main class the logic of the program tested Some users and tasks created.
    Subscriber
    interface has overloading method update.
    Task
    this class is used for tasks.
    TaskCategory
    This enum of categories that Task can have
    TaskManager
    This class manages Task class.
    TaskState
    This enum of states that Task can have
    User
    this is class for users, they can subscribe to tasks and categories that`s why this class implements Subscriber
